key.name: toggle-popup
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to show/hide the clipboard popup

key.name: paste-as-plain
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to paste clipboard as plain text

key.name: history-size
key.description: Maximum number of items to keep in clipboard history

key.name: max-item-size-mb
key.description: Maximum size of a single clipboard item in megabytes

key.name: max-image-size-mb
key.description: Maximum size of images to store in megabytes

key.name: storage-path
key.description: Custom path for storing clipboard database. Empty means use default location.

key.name: track-images
key.description: Whether to track images in clipboard history

key.name: track-files
key.description: Whether to track file copies in clipboard history

key.name: track-primary-selection
key.description: Track PRIMARY selection (middle mouse button paste). Options: true=both, false=CLIPBOARD only

key.name: strip-whitespace
key.description: Strip leading and trailing whitespace from text items

key.name: paste-on-select
key.description: Automatically paste when selecting an item

key.name: close-on-paste
key.description: Close the popup window after pasting an item

key.name: show-notification
key.description: Show notification when copying items

key.name: skip-duplicates
key.description: Don't add duplicate items to clipboard history

key.name: max-db-size-mb
key.description: Maximum total size of clipboard database in megabytes

key.name: popup-at-cursor
key.description: Show popup at current mouse position instead of center

key.name: preview-length
key.description: Maximum characters to show in item preview

key.name: items-per-page
key.description: Number of items to show in popup

key.name: excluded-apps
key.description: List of applications to exclude from clipboard tracking

key.name: custom-lists
key.description: JSON array of custom lists

key.name: show-indicator
key.description: Show ClipMaster indicator in the top panel

key.name: indicator-icon
key.description: Icon to show in panel indicator

key.name: popup-width
key.description: Width of the popup window in pixels

key.name: popup-height
key.description: Height of the popup window in pixels

key.name: dark-theme
key.description: Use dark theme for popup (false for light theme)

key.name: theme
key.description: Visual theme for the popup. Options: adwaita, catppuccin, dracula, nord, gruvbox, onedark, monokai, solarized, tokyonight, rosepine, material, ayu

key.name: follow-system-theme
key.description: Automatically switch between light and dark Adwaita based on GNOME system theme

key.name: custom-theme-path
key.description: Path to a custom CSS file for theme customization. Leave empty to use built-in themes.

key.name: encrypt-database
key.description: Encrypt clipboard database for security

key.name: encryption-key
key.description: Auto-generated encryption key (do not modify manually)

key.name: debug-mode
key.description: Enable debug logging for troubleshooting. Logs can be viewed with: journalctl -f /usr/bin/gnome-shell | grep ClipMaster
